title: Is it permissible to take medicines that contain gelatin / gelatine? - assim al hakeem
transcript: so um I had gone to the doctors and she gave me a medicine and it contained uh it's like a capsule so it has like gelatin and I asked her for alternative and she gave the Alternatives and as far as I said no both the Alternatives have gelatin in it and I do not I ask the companies like to if they could give me the origin of the gelatin but they haven't replied so um I don't know if I should like wait for some more time or like should I just take it take the medicines it's an issue of dispute whether gelatin has undergone the process of istihala which I mentioned a bit earlier in my answers or not and the vast majority of medical doctors and scientists say that these gelatins do not contain any of pork or dead cows ingredients in them after this rigorous vigorous harsh process of transformation therefore I personally believe that it is permissible for you to consume that and Allah Knows Best
